pull.title: 0.18: [p2p] Enable reject messages by default
pull.body:
This PR reverts #14054 following discussion on the bitcoin-dev mailing list.

It also adds release notes to clearly document that the `enablebip61` option will be disabled by default in a future release before being removed entirely.

events.message: [p2p] Enable BIP 61 REJECT messages by default

events.body: Oops. Accidentally changed some unrelated formatting in the release-notes docs. Force pushed to fix.
utACK a7563633d25a99bb3ef170aaaeccacf44990f2d9, but the release notes change should (also) be done upstream in the wiki. Otherwise you risk it getting overwritten.

> Changed release notes upstream

Thanks Marco
